INSERT INTO tPartnerProduct ( sPartnerProductCode, sPartnerCode, nCategoryCode, sPartnerProductName, nPcPrice, nMobilePrice, sUrl, sImageUrl ) VALUES
( #{PartnerProd.code}, #{PartnerProd.partnerCode}, #{PartnerProd.categoryCode}, #{PartnerProd.name}, #{PartnerProd.pcPrice}, #{PartnerProd.mobilePrice}, #{PartnerProd.url}, #{PartnerProd.imageUrl} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sPartnerProductName = VALUES(sPartnerProductName), nCategoryCode = VALUES(nCategoryCode), nPcPrice = VALUES(nPcPrice), nMobilePrice = VALUES(nMobilePrice), sImageUrl = VALUES(sImageUrl)

INSERT INTO tPartnerProduct ( sPartnerCode, nCategoryCode, sPartnerProductCode, sPartnerProductName, nPcPrice, nMobilePrice, sUrl, sImageUrl ) VALUES ( #{partnerCode}, #{categoryCode}, #{code}, #{name}, #{pcPrice}, #{mobilePrice}, #{url}, #{imageUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT nCategoryCode AS categoryCode, sPartnerCode AS partnerCode, sPartnerProductCode AS code, sPartnerProudctName AS partnerName, nPcPrice AS pcPrice, nMobilePrice AS mobilePrice, sImageUrl AS imageUrl, bIsLinked AS isLinked FROM tPartnerProduct WHERE sPartnerProductCode = #{code} AND sPartnerCode = #{partnerCode}

SELECT P.sPartnerName AS partnerName, C.sCategoryName AS categoryName, PP.sPartnerProductName AS name, PP.sImageUrl AS imageUrl, PP.sUrl AS url, PP.nPcPrice AS pcPrice, PP.nMobilePrice AS mobilePrice, pp.dtCreatedAt AS createdAt FROM tPartnerProduct PP INNER JOIN tCategory C ON (PP.nCategoryCode = C.nCategoryCode) INNER JOIN tPartner P ON (PP.sPartnerCode = P.sPartnerCode)
AND C.nCategoryCode = #{categoryCode}
,sPartnerProductName ASC
,sPartnerProductName DESC
,dtCreatedAt ASC
,dtCreatedAt DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
